company.company_description:
NZX is at its core a markets business operating equity, debt, derivatives and energy markets. As New Zealand’s exchange we are passionate about working with our customers and stakeholders to grow the markets operated by NZX, which generate wealth integral to New Zealanders’ prosperity, and New Zealand companies getting ahead. 

To support the development of our core NZX is at its core a markets business operating equity, debt, derivatives and energy markets. 

As New Zealand’s exchange we are passionate about working with our customers and stakeholders to grow the markets operated by NZX, which generate wealth integral to New Zealanders’ prosperity, and New Zealand companies getting ahead. To support the development of our core markets, we provide trading, clearing, settlement, depository and data services. 

To ensure we are well connected to New Zealand investors, NZX owns Smartshares, New Zealand’s only issuer of listed Exchange Traded Funds, and KiwiSaver provider SuperLife. For more information, please visit: www.nzx.com

To ensure we are well connected to New Zealand investors, NZX owns Smartshares, New Zealand’s only issuer of listed Exchange Traded Funds, and KiwiSaver provider SuperLife. For more information, please visit: www.nzx.com

As New Zealand’s exchange we are passionate about working with our customers and stakeholders to grow the markets operated by NZX, which generate wealth integral to New Zealanders’ prosperity, and New Zealand companies getting ahead. 

To support the development of our core NZX is at its core a markets business operating equity, debt, derivatives and energy markets. 

As New Zealand’s exchange we are passionate about working with our customers and stakeholders to grow the markets operated by NZX, which generate wealth integral to New Zealanders’ prosperity, and New Zealand companies getting ahead. To support the development of our core markets, we provide trading, clearing, settlement, depository and data services. 

To ensure we are well connected to New Zealand investors, NZX owns Smartshares, New Zealand’s only issuer of listed Exchange Traded Funds, and KiwiSaver provider SuperLife. For more information, please visit: www.nzx.com

company_branch_locations.address: Zurich House, 21 Queen Street Auckland 1010, New Zealand
NZX Centre, 11 Cable Street Wellington 6011, New Zealand
